Race.Name: Half-Orc
Race.Description: Half-Orcs are extremely strong and have a bonus modifier to Strength. Half-Orcs also have a penalty to Charisma and Intelligence, and generally they have less charisma and intelligence than most other races. Half-Orcs excel in melee combat and Half-Orc favored class is Barbarian.

Feat.Name: Half-Orc Orc Blood
Feat.Description: Half-Orcs are treated as an orc by magical items and effects.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Half-Orc
Feat.Description: You were a Half-Orc in a previous life Tier1: +1 Intimidate Tier2: +1 Strength Tier3: +1 Racial Tree Action point
